Title: Illustrated explanation of the <Law of the PRC on Protecting Against and Mitigating Earthquake Disasters>
Notes: The Law of the People's Republic of China on Protecting Against and Mitigating Earthquake Disasters was adopted at the 29th Meeting of the Standing Committee of the Eighth National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China on 29 December 1997. It came into force on 1 March 1998.A translation of the text of the law can be found here.
